name: Average (Sk8terboii)
description: You play as James, who after his death is faced with fighting for his right to be remembered for who he was. His consciousness has been uploaded to a cloud post death but a pesky AI, instigated by his parents, is trying to get him to change his story, to make it more ordinary. During the story you, the player, will fight alongside James to preserve his legacy, or you can leave him hanging, it’s up to you.
